transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, hello.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Ji, IndiaMART se bol rahe ho?
Executive: Haan, IndiaMART se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji, ji, aaj [inaudible] aisa hai ki
Customer: Nahi nahi, yahi number hai, kal maine isi number se baat kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Haan, theek hai, theek hai, aap boliye. Wo wo Aditya ka mai manager hu, mera Abdul. Ye number bhi save kar lijiye aap.
Customer: Kabhi future me ho na toh aap mujhe is number pe call kijiyega sir. Theek hai, customer care se. Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Mai ye keh raha tha ki wo jo concern aapne raise kiya tha na, us concern ko humne backend me dala hua hai legal team me, samajh gaye sir?
Customer: Toh usme jo hai na thoda time lagega, mai aapko definitely usme update kar dunga sir. Kyuki abhi hume bas yahi confirm karna hai ki udhar se document aaya tha ki nahi. Agar udhar se document nahi aaya hoga toh fir mai aapko aage update kar dunga sir, theek hai? Toh usme thoda time lagega, humne dala hua hai aage. Baaki aapka jo concern hai sir ye aapne customer care pe call kiya tha, ye concern kya ho gaya hai sir? Toh isko mai close kar du sir?
Customer: Nahi close, jab tak wo nahi hoga tab tak close karenge toh fir wo reh jayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi, toh mai hu na coordination ke liye. Customer care se better hai ki aap humse coordinate kijiye sir is number pe.
Customer: Servicing ke liye toh mai hu na aapko.
Executive: Samajh gaya na. Theek hai, theek hai. Mai sir concern close kar raha hu, baaki ye number save kar lijiye, ispe call kijiyega sir. Theek hai, ye WhatsApp pe number hai. Aapke paas ek future na sir mail jayega verification ke liye, feedback ke liye, toh usse aap apna feedback de dijiyega sir, jo bhi maine aapse baat kiya. Okay, theek hai. Theek hai sir. Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Thank you so much sir, have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's raised concern is not yet resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive informed concern is in legal team.
- Executive assured to provide an update.
- Executive offered direct coordination on his number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a verification mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- concern, legal team, coordination, verification
